Specimen Type: Existing WGS data files (FASTQ, BAM, VCF) derived from patient genomic DNA
Purpose: To re-examine previously generated whole genome sequencing data using updated reference genomes, software, and databases to provide current and accurate clinical interpretations.
Equipment: Bioinformatics workstations/servers running tools such as BWA MEM, SAMtools, GATK, FreeBayes, and annotation resources (ClinVar, HGMD, gnomAD)
